description: Number of nonsquarefree integers between primes p(n) and p(n+1).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
example: Between 113 and 127 the 7 numbers which are not squarefree are {116,117,120,121,124,125,126}, so a(30)=7.
prog: (PARI) { n=0; q=2; forprime (p=3, prime(1001), a=0; for (i=q+1, p-1, a+=!issquarefree(i)); write("b061399.txt", n++, " ", a); q=p ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 22 2009
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 07 2001
